# Selected R Packages

```{r showcase, echo = FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(apputils)
pkgs <- "reinforcelearn"
page_urls <- paste0("https://markdumke.github.io/", pkgs)
img_urls <- rep("assets/img/Rlogo.svg", 1) # reinforcelearn.png
gh_urls <- paste0("https://github.com/markdumke/", pkgs)
lab <- paste0("<h4>", pkgs,
  "<a href=\"", gh_urls, "\" style=\"padding-left:10px;\"><span class=\"fa fa-github fa-lg\"></span></a></h4>")
lab <- purrr::map(lab, ~HTML(.x))
subtitles <- c("Reinforcement Learning in R")
app_showcase(page_urls, img_urls, pkgs, subtitles, lab, img_style = "padding:10px;", new_window = FALSE)
```
